product.name: Gugguladi oil
product.bestFor: Vericose,Arthritis,Knee pain, Back pain,Relives tight & soremuscles,Relives Joint stifness and all Vata dosha based pain.
product.suggestedUse: Apply to the Target joints and muscles,massaging the area until the oil is mostly absorbed.Repeat 2-3 times daily or as needed.
